short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and share your favorite video moments with PostcardMoment â€“ the ultimate video snapshot tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Postcard Moment" is a must-have Chrome extension for anyone who loves to watch videos and share their favourite moments with friends. With just a click, you can capture and turn your favourite video scenes into postcards that you can share with your friends on social media. 

Whether it's a funny scene from a comedy or a beautiful landscape from a travel vlog, "Postcard Moment" makes it easy to capture and share your favourite video moments.

** Please note that we are not affiliated with Google or Youtube. All content belongs to the creator, and it is your responsibility to ensure that you have the necessary permissions to take a screenshot and share it before you begin doing so. We are not responsible for any unauthorized use of content obtained through the use of our Postcard Moment tool.
